A humble billionaire that never sells.
Haters can't deny the fire in his eyes,
His SpaceX rockets never run out of propellant.
His tunnels are safe, cars are electric,
His inventions never disappoint.
And he's got a lot more than just one big company,
He's always thinking of ways to progress humanity.
Some call him an inventor, others him an entrepreneur,
No matter what, I will always respect his work.
He's an inspiration to me, the modern-day Henry Ford,
He brings a good name to billionaires the world around.

Verse 2:

Elon Musk, the second one in the battle,
He's got all the cash and he's got the muscle.
He's creating jobs, he's creating ideas,
He's always trying to think beyond the years.
He's a man with passion and with ambition,
There's no limit to the things that he can do.
So listen closely as he drops these rhymes,
You will realize that he's not the same as you.
He brings his ideas to life with every plan,
His work is remarkable, his legacy is grand.
I may be a part of him, but I certainly am not the same,
The other one in this battle, he's my clone, but I am not the game.

His SpaceX rockets never run out of propellant.
His tunnels are safe, cars are electric,
His inventions never disappoint.
And he's got a lot more than just one big company,
He's always thinking of ways to progress humanity.
Some call him an inventor, others him an entrepreneur,
No matter what, I will always respect his work.
He's an inspiration to me, the modern-day Henry Ford,
He brings a good name to billionaires the world around.

Verse 2:

He's creating jobs, he's creating ideas,

There's no limit to the things that he can do.

He brings his ideas to life with every plan,
His work is remarkable, his legacy is grand.
I may be a part of him, but I certainly am not the same,
The other one in this battle, he's my clone, but I am not the game.
